sanskrit: अन्ये च बहवः शूरा मदर्थे त्यक्तजीविताः| नानाशस्त्रप्रहरणाः सर्वे युद्धविशारदाः
Translation: And also many other heroes, ready to give up their lives for my sake, armed with various weapons and missiles, all well-skilled in battle.
answer: Duryodhana said that there were many other heroes on his side who were ready to give up their lives for his sake, and they were all well-skilled in battle, armed with various weapons and missiles.
